headline.main: PROMPT SOVIET AID URGED; Cairo Hears of Urgent Needs -- Pravda Lists Resources

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Nov. 2 (U.P.) -- Russian morale is "exceedingly good" and the gravest danger the Soviet faces is the serious loss of materials and industrial plants, according to travelers who left Kuibyshev, Russian secondary capital, five days ago.
abstract: continuous flow of ammunition and spare parts to USSR urged by Cairo sources and Col N Klimoff
snippet: CAIRO, Egypt, Nov. 2 (U.P.) -- Russian morale is "exceedingly good" and the gravest danger the Soviet faces is the serious loss of materials and industrial plants, according to travelers who left Kuibyshev, Russian secondary capital, five days ago...
